definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: The troops received orders to mobilize .
IDF troops mobilize on the Gaza - Israel border.
sentences.chinese: 以色列的地面部隊在爲最後的進攻作動員令。

sentences.english: I myself am shaking the earth and the sea.
sentences.chinese: 這是我的動員令，這是來自另一世界的信號。
